title: Negative Influence points after 3150 IP purchase
body: I had around 3600 IP, and I purchased Shaco for 3150 IP. Nest thing you know, I look up and see that I have negative 2499 IP. I dont want to grind and earn back the IP I lost, so can this be fixed?

replies.body:
Welp, that's not supposed to happen!

I did a little digging, and it looks like this happened because of a rare visual bug. You didn't actually have a negative balance, so no worries there. I've synced up your account on our end, and you should be able to see the right IP balance now. If you're still seeing that odd negative, feel free to hit us back up!
Ngl, did you... relog ? bc that might fix it.
